page_analysis.text_content:
Light well & stairwell standards
& site planning

• Such features may not be located on the side of the struc-
ture that faces the front yard.

• Maximum width (interior dimension) is 3'.

• The combined length (interior dimensions of the opening
excluding encasing structure) of all the excavated features
may not exceed 30% of basement perimeter.

• Allowable encroachment into required side yard is 3' max
(however feature must be a minimum of 3' from side lot
line).

• Allowable encroachment into required rear yard is 4'.

• The combined length (interior dimensions of the opening
excluding encasing structure) of all the excavated features
or portions of features that encroach into the required
yards, on all sides of the structure, may not exceed 15'.

• Excavated features shall not be harmful to neighboring
trees.

• Public Works Department must approve drainage system.

42

visual_elements.description: Figure 39: Examples of site plan with light wells & stairwells. The figure shows a top-down view of an 'Interior lot example' with a 'Rear yard' at the top and 'Front yard' at the bottom. The lot is bounded by 'Interior-side yard' on both left and right sides. Inside the lot, there's a 'Buildable area' (light grey dashed line rectangle) and a 'Main dwelling' (darker grey rectangle). Several light wells and stairwells are depicted as black and white rectangles encroaching into the side and front yards. Dimensions 'a', 'b', 'c', and 'd' are indicated for various light well/stairwell features. There are also measurements for '3' max. width' for a feature, '3' min. from lot line (Typ.)', and '3' max. into side yard (Typ.)'.
visual_elements.location: Right side of the page, spanning from top to bottom

visual_elements.description:
Legend for Figure 39, defining various line types and shaded areas:
- Solid black line: Curb
- Dashed black line: Lot line
- Grey checkered pattern: Sidewalk
- Dashed black line (thicker): Required setbacks
- Light grey dashed rectangle: Buildable area
- Dark grey solid rectangle: Dwelling
- Black solid rectangle: Lightwells & stairwells
- White solid rectangle: Lightwells & stairwells that encroach into the required yards
visual_elements.location: Bottom right of the page, within the figure area

technical_specifications.parameter: Combined length (interior dimensions of opening excluding encasing structure) of all excavated features
Allowable encroachment into required side yard
Minimum distance of feature from side lot line
Allowable encroachment into required rear yard
Combined length (interior dimensions of opening excluding encasing structure) of all excavated features or portions of features that encroach into required yards, on all sides of structure
Lightwells & stairwells (all features) a + b + c + d
technical_specifications.unit: percent of the perimeter of the basement

structural_elements.main_heading: Light well & stairwell standards & site planning
sections: Fig 39 Examples of site plan w/light wells & stairwells

additional_notes: Page number '42' is present at the bottom left.
The note under 'Lightwells & stairwells' states: 'Note: measurements are based on interior dimension of opening and exclude encasing structure.'
